item.title: [FLINK-10293] RemoteStreamEnvironment does not forward port to RestClusterClient
item.description: A user reported on the ML that the port given to the RemoteStreamEnvironment is not forwarded to the RestClusterClient.
item.summary: RemoteStreamEnvironment does not forward port to RestClusterClient

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The problem is that RemoteStreamEnvironment#executeRemotely is not setting RestOptions.PORT. This setting is evaluated in HighAvailabilityServicesUtils#createHighAvailabilityServices to determine the webmonitor URL:

    1. What is the purpose of the change

This PR fixes an issue for the `RemoteStreamEnvironment` where the provided port wasn't actually used for connecting to the cluster.

    1. Brief change log
  • set `RestOptions.PORT` in the client configuration
    1. Verifying this change

This change added tests and can be verified as follows:

  • run RemoteStreamExecutionEnvironmentTest
